name: Keto Chicken Crust Pizza
author: Yoly
summary: A pizza crust made from chicken? Yes, and it's great-tasting, too! Ideal if you're on the keto diet. Choose as many toppings as you want or just top with more cheese and more fresh basil.
ingredients: ¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Mix chicken, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, garlic, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper in a large bowl with your hands
Place chicken mixture between two pieces of parchment paper
Gently spread mixture into a circle or rectangle about 1/4-1/2-inch thick
Bake in the preheated oven until edges start to brown, 35 to 45 minutes
